meanings: (모르는 사람의 관심을 끌려고 할 때) 실례합니다
(지나가게 길을 좀 비켜 달라고 할 때) 실례합니다
(상대방의 말에 끼어들거나 약간 미안한 일을 할 때) 미안[죄송]합니다

vlive.korean: [이봐요 옥에 티씨..] 아... [Excuse me... Plastic knife...] Oh... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [THE BOYZ] 치즈 콜렉터 째짜니 모짜렐라 치즈로 돌돌말아 둥가둥가 해버려🧀 (NEW eating cheese tteokbokki set)
들어갈게요~ 실례합니다~ I will go in. Excuse me. 듣기 View video SF9 : 어머님들
vlive.english: I will go in. Excuse me.

vlive.korean: 저기요 저기요 손에 있는 타투 지금 한... Excuse me! Excuse me! The tattoo on my hand... 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 서수
vlive.english: Excuse me! Excuse me! The tattoo on my hand...

vlive.korean: 회기파전이라는 게 있어요 - 네? There's a phrase, called "Hoegi pajeon". - Excuse me? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 15. 겉바속촉 회기파전 아님! 경희대vs한국외대의 회기파戰에 낀 성균관! 그 결과는?
vlive.english: There's a phrase, called "Hoegi pajeon". - Excuse me?

vlive.korean: 하긴 이건 핑계다 내가 많이 찍었어야지 그렇지? But the excuse is that I should have taken a lot, right? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 오주년이 얼마 안남아따
vlive.english: But the excuse is that I should have taken a lot, right?

examples.korean: There is no excuse for sloppiness in your work. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 일을 대충 하는 데 대해서는 변명의 여지가 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There is no excuse for sloppiness in your work. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We can excuse his behaviour as youthful exuberance. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그의 행동을 젊은이다운 패기로 봐줄 수도 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We can excuse his behaviour as youthful exuberance. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She walked along rehearsing her excuse for being late. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 늦은 데 대해 변명할 말을 연습하며 걸어갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She walked along rehearsing her excuse for being late. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Excuse me, is this your seat? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 실례해요, 이거 당신 자리인가요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Excuse me, is this your seat? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Excuse my interrupting you. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 얘기 중에 끼어들어서 미안해요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Excuse my interrupting you. Add to Wordbook
